description:
Somerville historically had a zoning ordinance limiting housing units to at most four unrelated people. Specifically:

any number of persons related by blood, marriage, adoption, or foster care agreement and up to three (3) additional unrelated persons living together as a single housekeeping unit

This is something I'd been unhappy about for years, and I was enthusiastic about "4 unrelated is outdated" campaign to change it in in 2018. So I'm very happy that after a homeowner asked for a variance on this city council ended up
title: Four Unrelated Is Over!
